entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Instrumented clrjit causes random msbuild failures #67627
  • Rolling build failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.UseWindowsServiceTests.DefaultsToOffOutsideOfService #67625
  • Consider using RegexCasingEquivalence table for case insensitive matches when the pattern contains backreferences #67624
    7.0.0
  • Making numerical formatting specifiers more consistent #67623
  • XmlSerializer Breaks When An Empty Element is in the XML Stream. #67622
  • [API Proposal]: Allow keys with colons in config #67616
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamTests_MsQuicProvider.WriteAsync_LocalAbort_Throws failed with OperationCanceledException #67612
  • [iOS] OptionsMonitorTest.TestCurrentValueDoesNotAllocateOnceValueIsCached Test Fails #67611
    Future
  • ReadOnlySequence.Slice(int start, int length) has (perhaps) unexpected behavior #67607
  • [release/6.0] Test failure: profiler/multiple/multiple/multiple.sh #67605
    6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_56953/Runtime_56953/Runtime_56953.sh #67603
    6.0.x
  • Rolling build test failure: System.IO.Tests.FileSystemWatcherTests.FileSystemWatcher_Directory_Create_MultipleFilters with message "Created event did not occur as expected" #67601
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: Assertion failed 'addr->TypeIs(TYP_BYREF) || addr->IsIntegralConst(0)' #67600
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.LoggerExtensions.LogError does not log provided exception. #67597
  • Starting a process on M1(ARM) CPU is 10 times slower than on Intel CPU #67591
  • System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer does not work with Dictionary<string, object> #67588
    7.0.0
  • Bad Process.StartTime in .NET 6 on Android #67583
  • Aplication not found WindowsDesktop. @area-Host #67580
  • Regressions in System.ConsoleTests.Perf_Console and Perf_BitOperations #67598
  • Regressions in SequenceEqual #67596
  • Regressions in System.Globalization.Tests.StringSearch #67595
  • Regressions due to QJFL and OSR #67594
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Buffers.Text.Tests.Base64EncodeDecodeInPlaceTests #67592
  • FormattedLogValues struct should be public #67577
  • System.Reflection.Tests.AssemblyTests.GetSatelliteAssemblyNeg fails #67569
    Future
  • System.Reflection.Tests.TypeInfoTests.IsAssignableNullable fails #67568
    Future
  • Improve allocations in `ConfigurationBinder` #67566
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Test failure JIT/opt/OSR/tailrecurse/tailrecurse.sh #67215
    7.0.0
  • [iOS][tvOS] Generic math IntPtr SByte and Int16 test failures #61920
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Methodical/NaN/intrinsic_nonf_il_r/intrinsic_nonf_il_r.sh #66424
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/opt/Devirtualization/structreturningstruct/structreturningstruct.sh #66924
    7.0.0
  • Incorrect JsonException.Path when using non-leaf custom JsonConverters #67403
  • JIT: Writes to small args on macOS can (still) overwrite adjacent args #67331
  • [QUIC] SendResettableCompletionSource set exception in AbortWrite #59347
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Collections.CopyTo<String> #61213
    7.0.0
  • Bug in Task Completions on MacOS and Linux #67567
  • Building src/native results in "ignoring unknown option: --minimize" #66770

PullRequests

Created

  • [WIP][wasm] Build with emscripten packages, instead of emsdk directly #67626
    area-Build-mono
  • Add more StringSyntaxAttribute syntaxes #67621
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Default interface implementations of static virtual methods - ECMA-335 augments #67619
  • Fix unsupported type detection when serializing polymorphic System.Type instances #67618
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Allow access to child providers in ChainedConfigurationProvider #67610
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [WIP] Faster vsd hashtables #67609
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable MSVC standard conformance for JIT sources #67608
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add support for installing latest sdk for workload testing #67606
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Disable test Runtime_56953 #67604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix remote unwinding on MacOS Monterey (12) #67602
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.5
  • Pin Roslyn version for generators in .NET 7 ref pack #67599
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use SystemNative_GetTimestamp to calculate BootTime #67589
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • log entire content to see which assertion fails #67586
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, test-enhancement
  • Re-enable a few Regex source generator tests #67585
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Use ComSmartPtr in tests #67584
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Aot annotation on System.Text.Json #67582
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Check MultiCoreJit code cache before trying to jit method in mcj thread #67579
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Keep array MT alive while getting component size #67578
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • Change Regex UnicodeCategoryRanges to use spans #67576
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Allow running System.Reflection tests on NativeAOT #67575
    area-System.Reflection
  • Block implementation details on System.Object #67574
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make it possible to do typeof of function pointers #67573
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve reflection rooting generic methods #67572
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix some minor reflection bugs #67571
    area-System.Reflection
  • Fix generation of type forwarders #67570
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Override CompleteAsync() in StreamPipeReader to call Stream.DisposeAsync #67565
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution

Merged

  • Update branding to 5.0.17 #67614
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [iOS] Disable OptionsMonitorTest.TestCurrentValueDoesNotAllocateOnceValueIsCached #67613
    area-Extensions-Options
  • [tests] Re-enable generic math Create tests on iOS #67542
    arch-arm64, area-System.Runtime, os-ios, os-tvos
  • Move tests that touch the network to outerloop only for infra-stability reasons #67593
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Disable deleting call counting stubs #67563
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Revert "Publish crossgen as AOT if supported by the target platform" #67590
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Update error message for runtime not found #67564
    area-Host
  • Fix too wide constant stores to parameters on macOS #67336
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Call SendResettableCompletionSource.CompleteException in AbortWrite #67341
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Don't pass --minimize to Xcode 13.3 dsymutil #67543
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Don't force `TieredCompilation=0` for SuperPMI replay job #67489
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServices.Tests` for #67550
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocking-clean-ci

Updated

  • Fix for the elusive suspension hang on Win7 WOW64 #67628
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Project file hygiene #67532
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • [Group 7] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Console` #67459
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Allow custom IExternalScopeProvider in LoggerFactory via DI #67520
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Changing the logic for how we deal with RegexOptions.IgnoreCase matching. #67184
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [wasm] Perf: Fixes for blazor_scenarios #67414
    arch-wasm, tenet-performance
  • Fix System.DirectoryServices.Protocols to work on Linux #67338
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Don't cache commandline in coreclr diagnostics server #63356
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Fix in-process decoding of DateTime in EventSource #67557
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update maui iOS build sed command #67263
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on firefox #61776
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • WIP: switch over JIT/Methodical tests to run using merged wrappers #65597
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Llvm 13x #67416
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Reflection Invoke refactoring to support future byref-like and IL emit features #66357
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [Mono] Fix warnings to enable W4 on Windows. #66710
    os-windows, area-Build-mono
  • Single-file debugging support in DBI and createdump #67163
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Additional changes to merged test runners #67367
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • [wasm][debugger] Sort properties by protection level in structures. #63339
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Introduce write barriers in wasm bindings, migrate to ref/out params, add gc safe regions #65994
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/6.0] Fix loop cloning of array of struct with array field #67496
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Avoid issuing connection attempts for already cancelled requests #67226
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Add arm64 cross-arch msi installers #67265
    Servicing-approved, area-Setup, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Fix DNS cancellation deadlock #67291
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Load R2R images on osx-arm64 according to Apple's guidelines #67438
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Ignore non-X509 certificates in SignedCms #67462
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] [AOT] Don't set the 'CorrectedSynthesize' flag in the objc_imageinfo section. #67534
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 6.0.5
  • Upgrading the version of Package Validation used in the repo to reduce Build flakiness when loading Roslyn #66635
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Clean-up CacheEntry #59110
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Skip building crossgen when running in source build #67521
    source-build, area-Setup
  • Stop passing StandardOptimizationData.mibc to crossgen2 multiple times for SPC #67458
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Proposed changes to ECMA 335 for checked user-defined operators #66714
    api-approved, area-Meta
  • [debugger][wasm] ValueTypeClass refactoring. #63626
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Recursive validation for Options #67548
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Improve handling of common Regex sets #67365
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Split Reflection and SourceGen TypeInfos #67526
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [AOT] Don't set the 'CorrectedSynthesize' flag in the objc_imageinfo section. #67441
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Added support of atomic writes for custom value types #65635
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Removed JIT (uint) cast workaround to elide bound-checks in CoreLib #67448
    community-contribution
  • More precise writebarrier for regions #67389
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Don't detect link on path #67525
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update breaking-change-rules.md #66978
    documentation, area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] Move to Windows.10.Amd64.Server2022.ES.Open #67054
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] EmccCompile: Add support for compiling sequentially #67483
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Add a --aot-lazy-assembly-load command line option to load assemblies #67103
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 6.0.5
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Add perf-wasm pipeline #67312
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
